title: Systems/Software Engineer 1 at HPE
content:
Education: Btech in CSE
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: Fresher with 1 internship in summer 
Date of the Offer: Nov '23
Company: Hewlett-Packard Enterprises(HPE)
Title/Level: Systems/Software Engineer 1
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 12 LPA(fixed)
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 5.5L (2.5L Joining and 3L Retention over 2 years)
Total comp/CTC (Salary + Bonus): 12+5.5 = 17.5L
Other details: On Campus offer linked with a 6 month internship(40k stipend)

title: Flipkart | SDE1 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech Computer Science Engineering (2023 passout), Tier 2 college
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: Intern at our college
Date of the Offer: November 2023
Company: Flipkart
Title/Level: SDE 1
Location: Bangalore
Salary: Base 18,00,000 INR
Relocation: 40,000
Signing Bonus: 3,00,000
Stock bonus: 5,00,000 Vested over 4 yrs - 25% per yr
Bonus: N/A
Total comp(Salary+Bonus+Stock): 32,00,000 INR
Benefits: 15 days accommodation and travel taken care by the company
Other Details: Negotiated after receiving offer letter
